Headline: #70 Division Temporary Westbound Reroute near Division/Cicero
ShortDescription: Westbound 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Kostner, Augusta, Cicero and Division, due to street blockage near Division/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Kostner, Augusta, Cicero, then resume their normal route on Division, due to street blockage near Division/Cicero.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 35th/Iron
ShortDescription: Westbound 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, make a right turn, Iron Justine and 35th, due to street blockage near 35th/Iron.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, make a right turn, Iron Justine, then resume their normal route on 35th, due to street blockage near 35th/Iron.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
